hedline.hl1: Trial of Suharto Is Set to Start Aug. 31

abstract.p: Corruption trial of former Pres Suharto of Indonesia will start on Aug 31 (S)

block.p: A Jakarta judge said today that the trial of former President Suharto on corruption charges would start on Aug. 31 and that the ex-dictator must appear in court.
Mr. Suharto, who ruled Indonesia for 32 years before being forced to resign in 1998, was officially charged with corruption this month, accused of skimming nearly $500 million from the state.
A Jakarta judge said today that the trial of former President Suharto on corruption charges would start on Aug. 31 and that the ex-dictator must appear in court.
Mr. Suharto, who ruled Indonesia for 32 years before being forced to resign in 1998, was officially charged with corruption this month, accused of skimming nearly $500 million from the state.
Judge Lalu Mariyun, chief of the South Jakarta District Court, said Mr. Suharto, 79, must appear at his trial despite assertions by his lawyers that he is too ill.
''I have ordered the Jakarta prosecutor's office to bring Suharto to appear on Aug. 31 at the court,'' he told reporters.
President Abdurrahman Wahid has promised to pardon Mr. Suharto if he is found guilty, but only if he returns any ill-gotten wealth to the state.
